name: you have 20 seconds to bake a game for the 20 second game jam
name_original: you have 20 seconds to bake a game for the 20 second game jam
description:
in you have 20 seconds to bake a game for the 20 second game jam you literally have 20 seconds to bake a game for the 20 second game jam. choose your amount of ingredients wisely (as every click will influence your results) and add ideas, gameplay, sound, graphics, fun, storytelling and/or duration by clicking as fast as possible. with every ingredient, you have 20 possible outcomes and therefore lots of possible combinations.

please note: the game is designed to be experienced in full-screen mode.

made within 20 seconds (no, joke, it took about 3 days) in november 2022 for the 20 second game jam. i used from the unity asset store: Kitchen Applicance - Low Poly by Alstra Infinite, Kitchen Props Free by Jake Sullivan & FREE Witchcraft and Wizardry Assets by Ferocious Industries.

initially i wanted the plates/bowls/bottle to be physically moved around by the player, but it was too complicated to implement for me right now and i think just clicking also works well 🖱️| this is my first 3d game for web, but downloadable files are provided as well, in case of bad internet connection etc.
